testSteps.description: Given driver 1 should be able to sign in driver app

stackTrace.methodName: driver 1 should be able to sign in driver app

testSteps.description: And driver 2 should be able to sign in driver app
When broker should be able to create new market place order with truck_quantity = 5
And hydra - driver 1 should be able to bidding "new" order with truck quantity = 2
And broker should be able to view bidding list of "new" order
And broker should be able to select bidding of "new" order
And hydra - driver 2 should be able to bidding "new" order with truck quantity = 3
And broker should be able to select bidding of "new" order
And broker should be able to view bidding detail of "new" order
And hydra - broker should be able to accept all bids of "new" order
And driver 1 should be able to accept "new" offer
And driver 2 should be able to accept "new" offer
And ops manager should be able to get "new" truck requests info
Then driver 1 should be able to drop off all shipment
And driver 2 should be able to drop off all shipment
And broker should be able to verify "new" order completed
And hydra - broker should be able to rate "new" order of "existing" driver
And broker should be able to verify review "new" order info
